text: Adriana Benetti (12 December 1919 – 24 February 2016) was an Italian actress. She was known for her roles in Quattro passi fra le nuvole, C'è sempre un ma!, Uno tra la folla and Avanti c'è posto.... She was born in Ferrara, Italy. Benetti died in Rome on 24 February 2016 from complications of pneumonia. She was 96 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Emilia-Romagna Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Italian movie actors Category:People from Ferrara
title: Adriana Benetti
